name: Become a Rasetsu? (Tumblr)
description: Changes Tumblr dashboard buttons to be Hakuouki themed!
additional_info: Tumblr logo: Hakuouki logo Home button: Ochimizu bottle Inbox: Makoto/"sincerity" symbol Help: Mountain symbol Settings: Sakura blossom Logout: Katana A little combination project; Hakuouki logo render and basic coding edited by ochimizu, icon symbol image rendered by absens (All official imagery/logos and intellectual property credited to Idea Factory!)
